Replace.Text: Hatsuyuki is very happy that you share the same faith in Yelagund.
Kjerag belongs to Yelagund and will not tolerate contamination from other religions.
+{1_num} [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat strength comes from being in frozen ground.

There are many people willing to lead the charge for the Snow Lord, but this does not mean that the Snow Lord will not fight. On the contrary, when he takes up arms, his enemies should tremble. [NEWLINE]Despicable sneak attacks are meaningless in front of him, and facing fools who try to win by numbers, what needs to be done is also very simple - buy time for him.
